briefdescription.para: Uncomment this macro to enable uDMA driver check errors.

detaileddescription.para: Sets the the "complete" status for completed DMA transaction and ! starts next transaction from queue. Reset DMA completion IRQ flags

briefdescription.para: Interrupt about DMA transaction completion with error.

detaileddescription.para: Sets the the "complete with error" status for completed DMA transaction ! Reset the DMA channel.

memberdef.argsstring: (dma_desc_t *desc, void *source, void *dest, uint32_t size, uint32_t dmac_mode)
memberdef.name: _dmac_set_desc

briefdescription.para: Init uDMA controller with a valid dma_state_t structure.

detaileddescription.para: If you want to use this uDMA driver, you need to call the dmac_init function with a valid state, dmac will init the valid state. If initialized successfully, you can use the other uDMA APIs.

parameterdescription.para: DMA state structure, this should not be NULL

briefdescription.para: Configure uDMA descriptor with source/destination address, transfer size in bytes and ctrl mode.

detaileddescription.para: Note: The DMALLPx of desc will be set to NULL in this function, and DMACTRLx of desc will be set with right transfer size

parameterdescription.para: uDMA descriptor, this should not be NULL

briefdescription.para: Add linked descriptor for uDMA, head -> next.

parameterdescription.para: head uDMA descriptor, should not be NULL
next uDMA descriptor, could be NULL

briefdescription.para: Init a dma_channel_t structure - dma_chn with initial value.

detaileddescription.para: Note: Channel will be set to DMA_CHN_INVALID

parameterdescription.para: uDMA channel structure, should not be NULL

briefdescription.para: Configure uDMA channel with uDMA descriptor.

parameterdescription.para: uDMA channel structure, should not be NULL

briefdescription.para: Reserve a DMA channel, and bind it with dma_chn, and set the dma trigger source.

parameterdescription.para: This can be DMA_CHN_ANY or any valid channel id. For DMA_CHN_ANY, it will try to peek an available channel. For any valid channel id, it will try to reserve that channel.
uDMA channel structure, should not be NULL
DMA trigger source, this can be any value in dma_request_source_t enum
dma_chn is NULL, or channel is not a valid one, or there is no channel available now

briefdescription.para: Start uDMA transfer for dma_chn, and set callback and transfer priority.

detaileddescription.para: Note: When callback is NULL, then all INT field in DMA descriptor will be set to interrupt disable, otherwise it will be set to interrupt enable.

parameterdescription.para: uDMA channel structure, should not be NULL
callback function, when DMA transfer is done, it will be called with parameter which value is dma_chn
dma_chn is NULL or dma_chn->desc is NULL or channel of dma_chn is not a valid one or dma_chn is still in transfer
When channel is a aux-based channel, the dma descriptor should not be a linked list.
uDMA channel structure, should not be NULL
dma_chn is NULL or dma_chn->desc is NULL or channel of dma_chn is not a valid one

briefdescription.para: Clear channel transfer status and set it to DMA_IDLE.

parameterdescription.para: uDMA channel structure, should not be NULL
dma_chn is NULL or dma_chn->desc is NULL or channel of dma_chn is not a valid one

briefdescription.para: Release the channel used by dma_chn.

parameterdescription.para: uDMA channel structure, should not be NULL
dma_chn is NULL or dma_chn->desc is NULL or channel of dma_chn is not a valid one

briefdescription.para: Wait until channel transfer is done.

parameterdescription.para: uDMA channel structure, should not be NULL
dma_chn is NULL or dma_chn->desc is NULL or channel of dma_chn is not a valid one
uDMA channel structure, should not be NULL
dma_chn is NULL or dma_chn->desc is NULL or channel of dma_chn is not a valid one

briefdescription.para: API implementation for DMA Controller for ARC.
